name: WP iRecord Form – Record Wildlife
author: White Rabbit

sections.description:
A simple way to show the iRecord “Casual Record” page on your own website. Useful for wildlife recording and conservation groups.

Data entered in this form will be sent to the BRC database and in turn the NBN Atlas, where it is used to support wildlife conservation and biodiversity.

Display iRecord Form

Add the iRecord Casual Record Form to any page of your WordPress website by using the shortcode [wpirecord].

Taxon-specific Forms

Use these additional shortcodes below to display the iRecord Taxon-specific record submision forms.

Record Ladybirds

Add the iRecord Ladybird Recording Form [wpirecord-ladybird].

Record Moths

Add the iRecord Moth Recording Form [wpirecord-moth].

Record Glow Worms

Add the iRecord Glow Worm Recording Form [wpirecord-glow-worm].

Record Dragonflies

Add the iRecord Dragonflies – single species Recording Form [wpirecord-dragonfly-single].
Add the iRecord Dragonflies – multiple species Recording Form [wpirecord-dragonfly-multi].

Record Bryophytes

Add the iRecord Bryophytes Recording Form [wpirecord-bryophyte].

Record Grasshoppers & Allies

Add the iRecord Grasshoppers and allies Recording Form [wpirecord-grasshopper].

Record Earthworms

Add the iRecord Earthworms Recording Form [wpirecord-earthworm].

Plugin Credits

This plugin has been developed by White Rabbit to help others in recording biodiversity to support conservation. As a coporate supporter to the NBN we work to help data recorders and group members in the digital realm.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the plugin documentation to find out how to show the WP iRecord Form on your page.
sections.faq:
How do I show the iRecord Form on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord]

How do I record Ladybirds on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-ladybird]

How do I record Moths on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-moth]

How do I record Glow Worms on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-glow-worm]

How do I record Dragonflies on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-dragonfly-single] or [wpirecord-dragonfly-multi]

How do I record Bryophytes on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-bryophyte]

How do I record Grasshoppers on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-grasshopper]

How do I record Earthworms on my website?

Use the shortcode [wpirecord-earthworm]
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First release of this plugin.

1.1.0

  • Addition of Taxon-specific forms.

1.1.1

  • Updated description and FAQ.

short_description: Add an iRecord "Enter Casual Record" form to your website for recording wildlife observations on the UK national database NBN Atlas.
